title: Hoth Fact File
author: digdudemax
pages:
Hoth Fact File by
digdudemax
(data from Star Wars
Complete Locations
and wookipedia)
------------------
Region: Outer Rim
Sector: Anonat
System: Hoth
Suns: 1, 6th from Star
Moons: 3
Coords: K-18
Connecting Trade
Routes: Ison Trade

Corridor (one
hyperjump away) and
the CorellianTrade
Spine (one jump away,
connects to the all
powerful Corellian
Way)
Distance from Core
Worlds: 50,250 light
years
Orbital Period: 549
days
Class: Terrestrial
Diameter 7,200 km or

4,474 miles
Atmosphere: Clean,
beathable
Primary Terrain:
frozen ice plains,
glaciers, oceans,
mountains
Surface Water: 33%
liquid, all other
surface is mostly ice
Fauna:
-tauntaun
-ice worms
-wampa
